resource_name._description:
The resource name of the geographic view.
Geographic view resource names have the form:


`customers/{customer_id}/geographicViews/{country_criterion_id}~{location_type}`

_enums.description: The value is unknown in this version.
Location the user is interested in while making the query.
Location of the user issuing the query.

location_type._description: Type of the geo targeting of the campaign.

country_geo_target_constant._description: CriterionId for the geo target for a country.
